Package com.gcep.controller

Class ListsRESTController

java.lang.Object
com.gcep.controller.ListsRESTController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/lists") @CrossOrigin public class ListsRESTController extends Object
Provides the REST service endpoints for shopping list data operations
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gabriel Cepleanu

    • getListById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getListById(@PathVariable(name="id") int id)
      GET method for getting a list with the given list ID
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the list
      Returns:
      JSON response

    • getListsByUser

      @GetMapping("/user/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getListsByUser(@PathVariable(name="id") int id, @RequestParam(defaultValue="false") boolean noItems, @RequestParam(defaultValue="false") boolean noCustomItems)
      GET method for getting a list of all shopping lists from a specified user ID
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user
      noItems - If true, returns lists with no items
      noCustomItems - If true, returns lists with no custom items
      Returns:
      JSON response

    • createList

      @PostMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createList(@RequestBody ListModel list)
      POST method for creating a new shopping list. This method will ignore any list items specified in the request body.
      Parameters:
      list -
      Returns:
      JSON response

    • updateList

      @PutMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateList(@RequestBody ListModel updated)
      PUT method for updating a shopping list. This method will ignore any list items specified in the request body.
      Parameters:
      updated -
      Returns:
      JSON response

    • deleteList

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteList(@PathVariable(name="id") int id)
      DELETE method for removing a shopping list
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the list
      Returns:
      JSON response

    • mergeRecipeWithList

      @PostMapping("{list_id}/merge-recipe/{recipe_id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> mergeRecipeWithList(@PathVariable(name="list_id") int list_id, @PathVariable(name="recipe_id") int recipe_id)
      POST method for merging recipe items with a given shopping list
      Parameters:
      list_id - ID number of the list to merge with
      recipe_id - Id number of the recipe to merge with
      Returns:
      JSON response

    • addListItem

      @PostMapping("/items") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addListItem(@RequestBody ListItemModel item)
      POST method for adding a list item. List items are items with an associated item ID.
      Parameters:
      item - The list item information
      Returns:
      JSON response

    • addCustomListItem

      @PostMapping("/items/custom") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addCustomListItem(@RequestBody CustomListItemModel item)
      POST method for adding a custom list item. Custom list items are items that do not have an item ID, rather the name is given by the user.
      Parameters:
      item - The custom list item information
      Returns:
      JSON response

    • editListItem

      @PutMapping("/items") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> editListItem(@RequestBody ListItemModel item)

      item - The updated list item information
      Returns:
      JSON response

      @DeleteMapping("/items/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> removeListItem(@PathVariable(name="id") int id)

      Parameters:
      id - The ID number of the list item entry.

      JSON response
